enterProductStep.title: Select product
enterProductStep.emptyMessage: You currently have no products created in this app

enterCartStep.title: Select cart products
enterCartStep.emptyMessage: You currently have no products created in this app

paymentPage.activeTransactionMessage: This invoice already has active transaction in progress

tokenSelectForm.emptyMessage: No tokens are currently available in this store, but you can add them to get started!

addressForm.selectTokenMessage: To connect a wallet address, please select the token you want to use for payment first
addressForm.addressInputText: Enter the address of the wallet you will use to complete the payment. We need this to track and verify the on-chain transaction as our service is fully decentralized

transactionHistory.title: Transactions History
transactionHistory.emptyMessage: There are no transactions for this invoice yet

invoiceAmount.title: Invoice Amount Error
invoiceAmount.text: The minimum amount required to create an invoice is 1 USD. Please adjust the amount and try again.

noAddress.title: Wallet Addresses Error
noAddress.text: No addresses were found in your wallet. Please add an address or try connecting a different wallet.

walletConnectionNotConfirmed.title: Wallet Connection Error
walletConnectionNotConfirmed.text: The wallet connection was not confirmed. Please try again to continue.
walletConnectionNotConfirmed.textSecond: Maybe your wallet extension is inactive in browser. Activate it by clicking on its icon in your browser.

walletConnectionFailed.title: Wallet Connection Error
walletConnectionFailed.text: Unable to establish a connection with the wallet connector. Please check your wallet and try again.

walletAddressInvalid.title: Wallet Address Error
walletAddressInvalid.text: The wallet address you entered is invalid. Please check the address for any errors and ensure it is correctly formatted.

networkChangeFailed.title: Network Change Error
networkChangeFailed.text: Unable to automatically switch the wallet network. Please change the network manually in your wallet settings and try again.

transactionCanceled.title: Transaction Canceled
transactionCanceled.userCancelText: You have canceled the transaction. If this was unintentional, please try again.
transactionCanceled.lowBalanceText: Your balance is too low to complete the transaction. Please add funds to your account and try again.
transactionCanceled.timeLimitText: The time limit for completing the payment has expired. Please try again to proceed with your transaction.
transactionCanceled.somethingWrongText: Something went wrong with the transaction. Please try again later.
transactionCanceled.wrongNetworkText: The current network of your wallet is incompatible with this transaction. Please switch to the %{networkName} network manually and try again.

viewModeInvalid.title: View Mode Error
viewModeInvalid.text: Invalid viewMode: the provided attribute is not valid. Please ensure it matches one of the supported view modes: modal, paymentPage or relative (default).

modalTriggerInvalid.title: Modal Trigger Error
modalTriggerInvalid.text: Invalid trigger: the provided attribute is empty.

paymentPageNotAvailable.title: View Mode Error
paymentPageNotAvailable.text: The paymentPage display mode is currently available only for viewing invoices and transactions. To access invoice creation options, please use the relative (default) or modal display mode.

clientIdInvalid.title: Client ID Error
clientIdInvalid.text: clientId must be either a number or a valid UUID v4 format.

fetchTransactionFailed.title: Fetch Transaction Error
fetchTransactionFailed.text: Failed to retrieve transaction data. Please try again later.

fetchInvoiceFailed.title: Fetch Invoice Error
fetchInvoiceFailed.text: Failed to retrieve invoice data. Please try again later.

tokenNameInvalid.title: Cryptocurrency Error
tokenNameInvalid.text: The token name you entered is incorrect. Please double-check the name and try again.

networkNameInvalid.title: Cryptocurrency Error
networkNameInvalid.text: The token network you selected is incorrect. Please verify the network and try again.

cryptocurrencyInvalid.title: Cryptocurrency Error
cryptocurrencyInvalid.text: The token name and network you entered is incorrect. Please verify the token name and network and try again.

appIdInvalid.title: App ID Error
appIdInvalid.text: You did not pass the appId. In order to continue, the appId field must be filled in.

fetchAppFailed.title: Fetch App Error
fetchAppFailed.text: Failed to retrieve app data. Please try again later.

fetchProductsFailed.title: Fetch Products Error
fetchProductsFailed.text: Failed to retrieve app products data. Please try again later.

fetchCurrenciesFailed.title: Fetch Currencies Error
fetchCurrenciesFailed.text: Failed to retrieve currencies data. Please try again later.

fetchTokensFailed.title: Fetch Tokens Error
fetchTokensFailed.text: Failed to retrieve token data. Please try again later.

invoiceCreateFailed.title: Invoice Create Error
invoiceCreateFailed.text: Failed to create invoice. Please, try again later.

transactionCreateFailed.title: Transaction Create Error
transactionCreateFailed.text: Failed to create transaction. Please, try again later.

transactionIdEmpty.title: Transaction ID Error
transactionIdEmpty.text: Unable to retrieve the ID of transaction. Please try again later.

transactionCancelFailed.title: Transaction Canceling Error
transactionCancelFailed.text: Failed to cancel the transaction. Please try again later.

fetchTransactionsFailed.title: Fetch Transactions Error
fetchTransactionsFailed.text: Failed to retrieve transactions of invoice. Please try again later.

tokens.title: Tokens
tokens.emptyMessage: No tokens are currently available in this store, but you can add them to get started!

wallet.title: Wallet address
wallet.inputText: Enter the address of the wallet you will use to complete the payment. We need this to track and verify the on-chain transaction as our service is fully decentralized

address.title: Approve the Wallet to Continue
address.text: Please confirm if you'd like to proceed using this wallet address to continue with the transaction.
